comment.body:
@nofish: The shared tracker is good. But how to prevent phishing attacks? I recommend not to connect all trackers first, pick a few at random, and if not, get others.Users can set security levels as needed.
Can not synchronize all trackers, only random synchronization to share some, otherwise all shielded.

> [nofish](#comment_311_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I have added some changes to prevent problems: Only zero trackers accepted, Stop discovering new trackers after it found 5 working ones.

Thank you 👍
ZeroNet need to share other format trackers, Easy connection and  security are very important, It is best to let users set their own security level.



Mandatory upgrade version number erro，The pop-up message is 'Update ZeroNet 0.6.2 '

> [keedar](#comment_3_17Yg9q5JQGGAYFEyg3mJf6Jky8DyXR7WaE): 要么代理连Tracker，要么等ZeroNet实现DHT功能，傻逼懂了没？

都按你这样，就活该打不开站点，活该菜死。加几千个节点，只要有一个节点访问过要访问的网站，就能打开。如果要访问的站点，几千分之一的概率都没，那再加更多，再打不开，那要访问的站点就太冷门了，使用其他方法也都不好使。

有兴趣的可以了解下参数zeronet_peers
